reporting-org.narrative: Centre de recherches pour le développement international
Centro Internacional de Investigaciones para el Desarrollo

title.narrative: Amélioration de la programmation d'incidences positives pour les femmes dans les projets financés par le FCRSAI et de l'obtention de ces incidences
Strengthening the Programming and Delivery of Gender Equity Outcomes in CIFSRF Projects

description.narrative:
The Canadian International Food Security Research Fund (CIFSRF) pays particular attention to women farmers. It also considers women's needs in research design, their participation on research teams, and the potential impact of research on women. However, initial monitoring of CIFSRF projects and analysis of its interim technical reports indicates that those goals are being inconsistently met. Although gender integration is generally considered to be cross-cutting in all projects, some research teams are weak at incorporating gender-related questions or indicators in research activities. As well, gender analysis capacity is often limited among research teams. The CIFSRF Risk Management Strategy itself notes the difficulty of ensuring the achievement of gender equality in both the development and application of research.
Recognizing the challenge that researchers face in addressing questions of gender and social equity in agriculture and nutrition, the CIFSRF team developed a strategy for achieving better gender outcomes in its projects. This research support project will enable key activities of that strategy to take place: - a gender audit of the CIFSRF portfolio and project gender updates; - a gender learning and capacity-building workshop; - a gender peer-learning and mentoring support group; and - development of tools for tracking, monitoring, and communicating gender outcomes stories.
Expected results from these efforts include improved capacity in gender analysis and a fuller application of systematic gender analysis and equity in CIFSRF projects; a more rigorous and systematic gender analysis in technical progress reports and publications; improved tools for monitoring and tracking CIFSRF project gender outcomes; a range of communication products and synthesis reports on gender equity analysis and impacts; and practical strategies for gender integration in food security research and implementation.
